description:
Jesse is another tasty young straight dude fresh out of a 4-year stint in the Marines. He's really a sweet guy, but you can tell that he's rebelling against all that discipline. He did this video because he wanted to do something different, and who am I to turn him down?
He's got a nice, smooth, muscular body, a fat uncut dick, and big, beautiful nuts. I'm always curious about the uncut ones and I asked him how he escaped the knife. He said he didn't know, but apparently his parents are hippie types so that may have something to do with it.
The best part of this video is when I tell him that he has a big cock. He gets this adorable smile on his face that just won't go away. God, I love straight guys...
title: Jesse
